entry.title: Under The Influence
entry.summary:
Author: Arloxacid

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,880Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 53

Summary: He didn’t quite get it. Merlin didn’t quite understand why Arthur would invite him for a drink with him and his friends, the knights. It’s not that he was complaining, but he hadn’t done it before so why now? Arthur on the other hand, knew exactly what he was doing bringing Merlin to a pub. As far as Arthur knew, Merlin went to the pub regularly and couldn’t pass up a good drink. With Merlin drunk he could figure out what his servant was hiding from him all this time.

entry.title: The Queen They Could Not Keep
entry.summary:
Author: Courtell8345

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,498Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 8

Summary: Lady Celeste arrives at Camelot in a shimmer of silk and sunlight, sent from a faraway court to strengthen the ties between kingdoms. With her daring gowns, silver-tongued wit, and enchanting beauty, she quickly captures the hearts—and the fantasies—of the knights of the Round Table.But Celeste is no docile noblewoman. She is bold, curious, and entirely unbound by the expectations of courtly love. As she weaves herself into the life of Camelot, she shares stolen glances, whispered promises, and forbidden moments with knights who long for her touch and dream of her favour.Yet not all eyes upon her are noble. When a dark sorcerer casts a love enchantment upon her, the court is thrown into peril. Her strength will be tested, her desires manipulated, and her heart torn between magic and memory.From moonlit balconies to the sparring fields, and from secret lessons in passion to the fierce bonds of friendship, The Queen They Could Not Keep is a tale of seduction, sovereignty, and the power of a woman who will never be owned—only adored.
